hero.title: Learn anything. Remember everything.
hero.titleHighlight: A tutor that truly understands you.
hero.subtitle: Generate personalized courses on any subject. Our platform remembers your progress, notices when understanding fades, and brings back what matters—exactly when you're about to forget it. Not another course library. A genuine learning companion.

understanding.title: Understands How You Learn
understanding.description: Discovers your unique learning patterns through real conversations, not standardized assessments

memory.title: Never Forgets
memory.description: Reviews return at the precise moment before forgetting begins—building memory that actually lasts

growth.title: Grows With You
growth.description: Every session builds on the last, creating a learning journey that evolves as you do

science.title: Built on How Memory Actually Works
science.subtitle: Most learning platforms treat every learner the same. We discovered that real learning happens when you understand the rhythm of each mind—when to challenge, when to reinforce, when to let ideas settle.

courses.title: Generate Any Course, Instantly
courses.description: Want to learn Python? Arabic calligraphy? Quantum physics? Just ask. Our platform generates complete, personalized courses on any subject—built from your actual understanding, not a one-size-fits-all curriculum.
courses.benefit1: Any topic, any skill level, any goal
courses.benefit2: Content adjusts as your comprehension deepens
courses.benefit3: Bite-sized chunks that respect your time
courses.benefit4: Multiple approaches to master each concept

memory.title: Neural Spaced Repetition
memory.description: We've moved beyond outdated flashcard systems. Our approach learns your unique forgetting patterns, bringing back concepts at the moment they're about to fade—turning fragile knowledge into permanent understanding.
memory.benefit1: Reviews timed to your personal memory rhythm

tutor.title: A Tutor That Truly Knows You
tutor.subtitle: Not a chatbot. Not a video library. A patient companion who remembers, understands, and grows alongside you.

remembers.title: Remembers Every Breakthrough
remembers.description: That moment when the concept finally clicked? When the pattern became clear? Your tutor remembers—and builds on those victories in every future conversation.

patient.title: Infinitely Patient
patient.description: No frustration. No rushing. No making you feel behind. Every question is welcomed, every struggle is supported, every pace is the right pace.

celebrates.title: Celebrates Real Progress
celebrates.description: Not empty praise for completing exercises—genuine recognition when understanding deepens. You'll feel the difference between hollow encouragement and earned confidence.

adapts.title: Adapts to Your Energy
adapts.description: Short on time? Quick focused session. Ready for a deep dive? Let's explore something new. The experience meets you where you are.

tutor.quote: "The best teachers don't just deliver information. They notice. They remember. They know when to push and when to pause. That's what we built."

safety.title: Security You Can Trust
safety.subtitle: Your learning journey is personal. Every interaction, every piece of data, every moment on our platform is protected by multiple layers of security.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: Your learning journey is private. Conversations, progress, and personal information are encrypted and never shared.

content.title: Quality-Assured Content
content.description: Every response is validated through our content systems, ensuring accurate and helpful information.

privacy.title: Your Data Stays Yours
privacy.description: We don't sell data. We don't share it with advertisers. Your information exists only to serve your learning.

control.title: Full Visibility
control.description: See your complete learning history, track your progress, and understand how your knowledge grows—whenever you want.

howItWorks.title: Getting Started is Simple
howItWorks.subtitle: Three steps from signup to learning. No complicated setup, no learning curve.

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: A few questions help us understand your interests, goals, and where you are in your learning journey.

step2.title: Start Learning Anything
step2.description: Type any topic. Our platform generates a complete, personalized course built around how you learn best.
step2.point1: Any subject—from languages to programming to music
step2.point2: Courses generated instantly, tailored to you
step2.point3: Voice, text, or visual learning styles

step3.title: Watch Knowledge Stick
step3.description: Our neural spaced repetition ensures what's learned stays learned. You'll see real understanding, not just completed exercises.

cta.title: Ready to Learn Anything and Remember It?
cta.subtitle: Join learners who've discovered what happens when technology truly understands how people learn.

assistant.greeting: Hi! I'm your AI assistant with voice capabilities.
assistant.error_generic: I encountered an error. Please try again.
assistant.no_microphone: Microphone access denied or not available
assistant.voice_not_supported: Voice features not supported in this browser
